headline.print_headline: Drogba the Main Man for Brazilian Philosophy Teachers
headline.main: Drogba the Main Man for Brazilian Philosophy Teachers

docs.snippet: Their countrymen may be swept up in a wave of Neymar euphoria after his two goals against Croatia, but Brazil's philosophy teachers are firmly behind another leading striker - Didier Drogba of the Ivory Coast....
docs.lead_paragraph: Their countrymen may be swept up in a wave of Neymar euphoria after his two goals against Croatia, but Brazil's philosophy teachers are firmly behind another leading striker - Didier Drogba of the Ivory Coast.

headline.print_headline: Switzerland: From Bores to Draws at the World Cup
headline.main: Switzerland: From Bores to Draws at the World Cup

docs.snippet: From being the bores of the last two World Cups, Switzerland could be one of the draws of the 2014 tournament as retiring coach Ottmar Hitzfeld puts his faith in an exciting younger generation in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: From being the bores of the last two World Cups, Switzerland could be one of the draws of the 2014 tournament as retiring coach Ottmar Hitzfeld puts his faith in an exciting younger generation in Brazil.

headline.print_headline: No Time for Regrets, Says Spain Defender Ramos
headline.main: No Time for Regrets, Says Spain Defender Ramos

docs.snippet: Sergio Ramos declared he was not going to spend another second beating himself up over Spain's 5-1 World Cup defeat to the Netherlands but, like Dutch strikers the night before, the questions kept on coming....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sergio Ramos declared he was not going to spend another second beating himself up over Spain's 5-1 World Cup defeat to the Netherlands but, like Dutch strikers the night before, the questions kept on coming.

headline.print_headline: Afghan Voters Want Security, Jobs Above All
headline.main: Afghan Voters Want Security, Jobs Above All

docs.snippet: Afghan voters were divided over which candidate to support in Saturday's presidential runoff, but they broadly agreed on what they were looking for in their new leader after decades of war — security and jobs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Afghan voters were divided over which candidate to support in Saturday's presidential runoff, but they broadly agreed on what they were looking for in their new leader after decades of war — security and jobs.

headline.print_headline: Sotomayor Drops by Hillary Clinton Book Signing
headline.main: Sotomayor Drops by Hillary Clinton Book Signing

docs.snippet: You never know who'll show up at a Hillary Rodham Clinton book event....
docs.lead_paragraph: You never know who'll show up at a Hillary Rodham Clinton book event.

headline.print_headline: Improved Swiss Confident of Last-16 Berth-Hitzfeld
headline.main: Improved Swiss Confident of Last-16 Berth-Hitzfeld

docs.snippet: Switzerland have improved since the last World Cup in 2010 and are confident they can reach the last 16 as one of two qualifiers from Group E, coach Ottmar Hitzfeld said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Switzerland have improved since the last World Cup in 2010 and are confident they can reach the last 16 as one of two qualifiers from Group E, coach Ottmar Hitzfeld said on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Suarez Watches as Uruguay Stunned by Costa Rica
headline.main: Suarez Watches as Uruguay Stunned by Costa Rica

docs.snippet: Watching from the bench, Luis Suarez saw just how much his teammates miss him....
docs.lead_paragraph: Watching from the bench, Luis Suarez saw just how much his teammates miss him.

headline.print_headline: The Man Who Brought Futebol to Brazil
headline.main: The Man Who Brought Futebol to Brazil

docs.snippet: The World Cup unfolding on your screens owes a debt of gratitude to a man with a mighty handlebar mustache....
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Cup unfolding on your screens owes a debt of gratitude to a man with a mighty handlebar mustache.

headline.print_headline: Pride at Stake for Iran at World Cup
headline.main: Pride at Stake for Iran at World Cup

docs.snippet: Iran will earn the respect of soccer fans around the world with its performance against Nigeria in their World Cup opener on Monday, according to the team's goalkeeping coach....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran will earn the respect of soccer fans around the world with its performance against Nigeria in their World Cup opener on Monday, according to the team's goalkeeping coach.

headline.print_headline: Neymar Vows Business as Usual Amid Suspension Fears
headline.main: Neymar Vows Business as Usual Amid Suspension Fears

docs.snippet: Brazilian striker Neymar has played down talk that a yellow card in the World Cup opener against Croatia will force him into a less aggressive style of play, with fans and backroom staff worrying that a second caution could see him banned from a v...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian striker Neymar has played down talk that a yellow card in the World Cup opener against Croatia will force him into a less aggressive style of play, with fans and backroom staff worrying that a second caution could see him banned from a vital knock-out match.
